Class Level

java.lang.Object
model.Level
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Level extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single game level. This class holds the 2D tile map, the player's spawn point, and lists of all entities present in the level, such as enemies, lifts, and furniture.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level(Tile[][] levelData, Point playerSpawn, List<Enemy> enemies)
      Constructs a new Level.
      Parameters:
      levelData - The 2D array of tiles that form the level's structure.
      playerSpawn - The starting coordinates for the player in this level.
      enemies - A list of enemies present in this level.

  • Method Details

    • freezeEnemies

      public void freezeEnemies(long durationSec)
      Activates the "frozen" effect for all enemies in this level.
      Parameters:
      durationSec - The duration of the freeze in seconds.

    • areEnemiesFrozen

      public boolean areEnemiesFrozen()
      Checks if the enemies in this level are currently under the "frozen" effect.
      Returns:
      True if enemies are frozen, false otherwise.
